code: @Override protected void doExecute(Task task, SimulatePipelineRequest request, ActionListener<SimulatePipelineResponse> listener) {     final Map<String, Object> source = XContentHelper.convertToMap(request.getSource(), false, request.getXContentType()).v2().     final SimulatePipelineRequest.Parsed simulateRequest.     try {         if (request.getId() != null) {             simulateRequest = SimulatePipelineRequest.parseWithPipelineId(request.getId(), source, request.isVerbose(), ingestService).         } else {             simulateRequest = SimulatePipelineRequest.parse(source, request.isVerbose(), ingestService).         }     } catch (Exception e) {         listener.onFailure(e).         return.     }     executionService.execute(simulateRequest, listener). }
